title: About Me 👨🏽‍💻
intro: Animal Lover & Future Web Developer in Toronto. University of Toronto Coding Bootcamp graduate.
text1: From learning human languages to machine language, I'm passionate about learning new things, including web development. I'm looking forward to working full-time as a full-stack web developer. Want to know more about me?
text2: P.S. I can speak four languages fluently- English, French, Cantonese, and Mandarin.
